movie.title: Bedlam
movie.description_intro: George is haunted by the demons of his family's past and tortured by the voices inside his head. He makes one last attempt at recovery by contacting his dead mother's doctor. The doctor's orders; that he attend Bedlam Hospital for a guaranteed recovery. As George checks in he's confronted by a world of society's unwanted, unloved and unstable. Soon, he will discover that all is not as it seems. The hospital hides a dark secret. Welcome to Bedlam...
movie.description_full: George is haunted by the demons of his family's past and tortured by the voices inside his head. He makes one last attempt at recovery by contacting his dead mother's doctor. Soon, he will discover that all is not as it seems. The hospital hides a dark secret. Welcome to Bedlam...

movies.title: The Man Who Walked Around the World
movies.title_english: The Man Who Walked Around the World
movies.title_long: The Man Who Walked Around the World (2020)
movies.summary: The true story of a Scottish farm boy whose interest in blending whisky led to the creation of a global icon. Filmmaker Anthony Wonke explores how Johnnie Walker became embedded in popular culture, and has managed to still be there 200 years later.
movies.description_full: The true story of a Scottish farm boy whose interest in blending whisky led to the creation of a global icon. Filmmaker Anthony Wonke explores how Johnnie Walker became embedded in popular culture, and has managed to still be there 200 years later.

movies.title: Ghost Killers vs. Bloody Mary
movies.summary: Four YouTubers with expertise in supernatural events are seeking recognition from the audience whilst solving the urban legend of the Bathroom Blonde Case. The spirit that haunts the schools' bathroom in Brazil.
movies.description_full: Four YouTubers with expertise in supernatural events are seeking recognition from the audience whilst solving the urban legend of the Bathroom Blonde Case. The spirit that haunts the schools' bathroom in Brazil.

movies.title: Always Woodstock
movies.summary: When Neurotic, struggling songwriter, Catherine Brown's life in New York City falls apart, she is forced to confront her past when she spends the summer at her childhood home in Woodstock, New York, learning that becoming successful means becoming your true self first.
movies.description_full: When Neurotic, struggling songwriter, Catherine Brown's life in New York City falls apart, she is forced to confront her past when she spends the summer at her childhood home in Woodstock, New York, learning that becoming successful means becoming your true self first.

movies.title: The Grudge
movies.summary: Karen Davis, an American Nurse, moves to Tokyo and encounters a supernatural spirit who is vengeful and often possesses its victims. A series of horrifying and mysterious deaths start to occur, with the spirit passing its curse onto each victim. Karen must now find a way to break this spell, before she becomes its next victim.
